DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine long-term appearance resorption rate biocomposite screw use ACL reconstruction X-ray compute tomography ( CT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective CT Imaging BioComposite Interference Screw With BTB
DOC.criteria: Ages 1850 Patients underwent primary ACL reconstruction perform one study investigator least 5 year ago Isolated ACL tear Type graft use bonepatellar tendonbone autograft Type screw use attach graft tibia and/or femur BioComposite interference screw ( Arthrex , Inc. ) No degenerative joint disease preoperative Xrays ( > 50 % joint space loss , presence osteophyte ) Revision ACL reconstruction Types graft bonepatellar tendonbone autograft use ACL tear concomitant pathology Degenerative joint disease preoperative Xray ( > 50 % joint space loss , presence osteophyte ) Metal type bioabsorbable screw BioComposite interference screw ( Arthrex , Inc. ) use ACL reconstruction perform less 5 year ago Pregnancy Greater Grade 2 laxity ligaments No additional fixation
